getAccounts.doc: Lists all accounts to which the user has access.

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

getGoals.doc: Lists goals to which the user has access.

accountId.doc: Account ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts to which the user has access. (string)

webPropertyId.doc: Web property ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties to which the user has access. (string)

profileId.doc: Profile ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific profile ID or '~all', which refers to all the profiles to which the user has access. (string)

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

getProfileData.doc: Returns Analytics data for a profile.

ids.doc: Unique table ID for retrieving Analytics data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics profile ID. (string)

start-date.doc: Start date for fetching Analytics data. All requests should specify a start date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. (string)

end-date.doc: End date for fetching Analytics data. All requests should specify an end date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. (string)

metrics.doc: A comma-separated list of Analytics metrics. E.g., 'ga:visits,ga:pageviews'. At least one metric must be specified. (string)

dimensions.doc: A comma-separated list of Analytics dimensions. E.g., 'ga:browser,ga:city'. (string)

filters.doc: A comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters to be applied to Analytics data. (string)

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

segment.doc: An Analytics advanced segment to be applied to data. (string)

sort.doc: A comma-separated list of dimensions or metrics that determine the sort order for Analytics data. (string)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

getProfiles.doc: Lists profiles to which the user has access.

accountId.doc: Account ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts to which the user has access. (string)

webPropertyId.doc: Web property ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties to which the user has access. (string)

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

getSegments.doc: Lists advanced segments to which the user has access.

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

getWebProperties.doc: Lists web properties to which the user has access.

accountId.doc: Account ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts to which the user has access. (string)

max-results.doc: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

start-index.doc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

fields.doc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
